level.text: CFSA shall post a sign in a conspicuous place on the exterior of each authorized receiving facility in the District. The sign shall state in plain terms that a newborn may be surrendered at the facility and shall provide information about how a person can determine whether a particular newborn has been surrendered.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8599 (October 30, 2009)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 5967 (July 9, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11742 (December 10, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 8052, 8057 (September 16, 2011).
